quiz_item.error_analysis: 易因“line”的字面义（线条/生产线）或“line manager”（直属经理）的联想，误判为“线条管理”“生产线管理”或“直属经理的个人管理”
quiz_item.sentence: In most companies, **line management** is responsible for overseeing daily operations and ensuring team goals are met, while staff management handles support functions like HR and finance.

option.definition: 直线管理（组织中直接负责生产或服务的层级管理）
